entries.content: Ask for permission at the start of a cold call: 'Would you like to hang up or let me have 30 seconds?'
Frame rejection as rejecting the proposition, not yourself.
Anchor meetings with 'If by the end of this, you don't feel comfortable, that's perfectly okay.'
entries.notes: Used to reduce pressure and set realistic expectations.

entries.content: Focus the call opening on gathering information, not selling.
Use curiosity-based questions to engage the prospect.
Your role is to help the buyer buy, not to force a sale.
Handle 'send me information' by asking, 'What specifically would be helpful for you to see?'
